website_summaries.verdict: A good 1/4-inch headphone audio jack adapter for headphones and musical instruments.
pros: Compatible with audio mixers, speakers, and musical instruments with a 1/4-inch input jack
Value pack comes with 2 spares in case one gets lost
cons: Rubber coating on the top of the audio jack can start to break apart after some use

customer_reviews.title: Adapter 6.5mm to 3.5mm 🤘
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured work great... I use mine on a older stereo system so I can plug in a 3.5mm aux cord so I can play music from my phone
customer_reviews.author: King☆Random

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Deserve Even One Star
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack of three "eBoot 6.35 mm Audio Stereo Plug to 3.5 mm Stereo Headphone Jack Adapters" and ALL THREE EVENTUALLY BROKE with only minimal wear and tear. There is a little silver ring that sits at the base of these where you plug your headphones in and that little silver ring WILL FALL OUT and even when you put it back in the sound you get will be HORRIBLE. Yeah, they're cheap to buy. But there is a REASON they are cheap to buy, and the reason is they are cheaply made and WILL FALL APART. I've told you why you shouldn't buy them. If you do, at least now you know what you're getting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best one worked only if you got the position just ...
customer_reviews.text: none of them worked properly. the best one worked only if you got the position just right. One small move and you introduced noise
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nek

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, broke within two weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for headphone adapters and all but 1 has broken. They pull apart, very poor quality, would rather spend the money to get quality adapters that work for more than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Flower

customer_reviews.title: - All three of the stereo plugs came in pristine condition - The sound quality is transferred amazingly - There is a bit of a weight to the product so it feels premium Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about this product. - All three of the stereo plugs came in pristine condition - The sound quality is transferred amazingly - There is a bit of a weight to the product so it feels premium Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Garo Khachikian

customer_reviews.title: Works, but can break
customer_reviews.text: It works, but in the first day, one of my kids broke one. Now, I should state that I have had similar adapters (possibly different manufacturer) before and my kids broke them, but the first one of the three broken with regular use in the first day. My kids use it when doing piano practice with electric piano. My kids have been using another from the set and it hasn't broken yet, but we are only about a week in. I have warned my kids to be careful and perhaps some of the risk goes away.
customer_reviews.author: lowly developer

customer_reviews.title: Audio stereo plug comes in different sizes and can be connected to your own headphones
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything we hope for and they come in different sizes to whatever your connecting with on electric panio or whatever system your using this connect the headphones you already love to your panio keyboard it saved me a tone of money and we live in apartment so my husband can play the panio late or early morning without people getting angry.
customer_reviews.author: Julia weber

customer_reviews.title: Must have if you travel to different fitness and dance studios
customer_reviews.text: This product meets the standards for converting your devices from 3.5mm to phono plug. I travel to teach at different fitness, gyms, and dance studios and this product will prevent any surprises when using different sound systems. good to have in your gym bag
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The do the job... My son can plug his phone into his amp to play as a speaker. It should work the other way, too... being able to use ear buds instead of the over-ear headphones with the amp (there is a quiet setting to not turn his brain to jello with too much power). But he doesn't use these that way.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Bought two packs of these to use with an in-ear stage monitor system. One adapter from each pack didn't work. That kind of undercut the sense of value. The ones that do work are OK; it wasn't worth the hassle to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: RobDog

customer_reviews.title: It fits my piano and headphones
customer_reviews.text: It is great for what I purchased it for Thank you
customer_reviews.author: s cavallo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, and good quality with snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to connect my Bluetooth transmitter/receiver to my guitar amp for streaming music from my phone. Didn’t need three but for $5 it’s a good deal, and I can give the other two away.
customer_reviews.author: Nola Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to plug headphones into our electric piano for quieter piano practice!

customer_reviews.title: Good for money
customer_reviews.text: Plug headphones into my Guitar amp for quiet Practice. I’m sure the quality of sound could be better but these for just fine to allow me to jam after my kids go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Zsa415

customer_reviews.title: What I needed when I needed it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no surprises and I like that. Gifts as a surprise OK, but, not components thank you very much. Amazon Prime makes life here in the hinterlands of SW Georgia so much easier than driving an hour and a half to discover the store is out of stock. It, almost, makes me feel like a real boy.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelSr

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job! Works for what I needed it for: Small headphone jack into the keyboard jack.
customer_reviews.author: Rich DS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap and when they work they work fine. However, they aren't sturdy. I had 1 fall apart pretty quickly. They are not returnable even when defective however Amazon credited my account when chatted with them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave T. Perek

customer_reviews.title: It works and its cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my head phones so I could use them on my FT-2000 Ham radio since it took a 1/4 inch plug. Works well and no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny G. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: All Three Adapters Don't Work
customer_reviews.text: None of these adapters worked on my bass amp. Funny enough, shortly after trying all three of these adapters, I found my working one. This product wasn't eligible for free returns, but Amazon gave me a refund all the same, so I'm not too disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dixon262

customer_reviews.title: Handy Adapter
customer_reviews.text: These adapters did exactly what we needed them to do! My parents purchased a digital piano for my kids, but we didn't have any stereo headphones...only headphonse and earbuds for iphones/iPads. This inexpensive adapter now allows my kids to plug in any headphone to the piano. It saves my sanity when there is a lot of practicing!
customer_reviews.author: clclark

customer_reviews.title: Works Fine with my Yamaha Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: These adapter work fine with my Yamaha keyboard. The volume and sound quality coming through the headphones is fine.
customer_reviews.author: AusDevAri

customer_reviews.title: They work fine, except one was damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a broken adapter on my studio strobes. They work fine, except one was damaged on arrival. It didn't matter much to me though as I just needed one. Happy with the product and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Gantt (TheMakersWorkbench)

customer_reviews.title: So good and so cheap!

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage. 0/5 stars. Do not buy.

customer_reviews.title: Good price, no issues.

customer_reviews.title: Rock on!

customer_reviews.title: Its okay, but doesn’t work as expected

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product!

product_meta.title: eBoot 6.35 mm Audio Stereo Plug to 3.5 mm Stereo Headphone Jack Adapter, Pack of 3
feature_bullets: Adapts 1/ 4 inch stereo jack into mini (3.5 mm) stereo jack
Stereo headphones only, not suitable for phone earphones with microphone
Can be applied to mixers and music applications
Enbles your headphones or other devices to be compatible with most pro audio and home audio equipments
360 Degree grip tread enables easy plugging and unplugging

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars842 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
